{{codepointer|Missile movement}}'''A_Tracer2'''
(no parameters)
This is Strife's seeker missile function. It is mostly identical with [[A_Tracer]] but there are a few notable differences:
* This function always seeks. There is no randomization involved. * This function does not spawn puffs behind the missile. * The seeking angle is slightly larger than for [[A_Tracer]].
This only works for missiles with the '''{{flag|SEEKERMISSILE}}''' flag.
